confirm_return_to_home: Are you sure you want the drone to return to its home location?
confirm_emergency_stop: Are you sure you want to perform an emergency stop? The drone will immediately stop all motors.
delete_media_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this media item?
faq_connection_title: How do I connect to my drone?
faq_connection_content: To connect to your drone, ensure it is powered on and within range. Go to the home screen and tap 'Connect'. Enter your drone ID when prompted and confirm. The connection status will update when successfully connected.
faq_battery_title: How long will my drone battery last?
faq_battery_content: Battery life depends on flight conditions, speed, and features used. Typically, you can expect 20-30 minutes of flight time on a full charge. Always monitor the battery level indicator and return home when it drops below 20%.
faq_flight_planning_title: How do I create a flight plan?
faq_flight_planning_content: To create a flight plan, go to Flight Planning from the home screen. Select a mission type (Waypoint, Grid Scan, or Area Scan), name your mission, and set parameters. Tap on the map to place waypoints or define an area, then save your mission.
faq_camera_title: How do I access my drone's camera?
faq_camera_content: The camera feed is available on the Control Screen once connected to your drone. If the camera is inactive, tap 'Activate Camera'. Use the camera controls to take photos or record videos, which will be saved to your Media Gallery.
information_collection_content: We collect information necessary for the operation of the drone controller app, including device information, location data, and media captured by your drone.
data_usage_content: The information we collect is used to provide and improve our services, troubleshoot issues, and enhance your drone flying experience.
location_data_content: Location data is essential for drone navigation and flight planning. This data is stored locally on your device and is not shared with third parties without your consent.
media_storage_content: Photos and videos captured by your drone are stored locally on your device. You have full control over this media and can delete it at any time.
data_sharing_content: We do not share your personal information with third parties except as required to provide our services or comply with legal obligations.
data_security_content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access or disclosure.
delete_mission_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this mission?
execute_mission_confirmation: Are you sure you want to execute this mission? The drone will follow the planned route.
